pageTitle: Deputy Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, December 13, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

2:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will join the Prime Minister’s meeting with the Premier of Quebec, François Legault.

Ministère du Conseil exécutif       
770, rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to present themselves to the lobby no later than 1:15 p.m.
